tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

share_id.description: The ID of an existing share.

actions.name: Unmanage share
actions.description: Configures Shared File Systems to stop managing a specified share.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

The ID for the tenant for which
 you want to show, update, or delete
 quotas. This ID is different from
 the first tenant ID that you
 specify in the URI: That ID is for
 the admin tenant.

actions.name: Show quotas
actions.description:
Shows quotas for a specified tenant.
 
 If you specify the optional user_id query parameter,
 you get the quotas for this user in the specified tenant. If you
 omit this parameter, you get the quotas for the specified project.

user_id.description:
The user ID. If you specify this query
 parameter, you update the quotas for this
 user in the specified tenant. If you omit
 this parameter, you update the quotas for
 the specified project.

actions.name: Update quotas
actions.description:
Updates quotas for a specified tenant.
 
 If you specify the optional user_id query parameter,
 you update the quotas for this user in the specified tenant. If you
 omit this parameter, you update the quotas for the specified project.

user_id.description:
The user ID. If you specify this query
 parameter, you update the quotas for this
 user in the specified tenant. If you omit
 this parameter, you update the quotas for
 the specified project.

actions.name: Delete quotas
actions.description:
Deletes quotas for a specified tenant.
 The quota will revert back to default.
 
 
 If you specify the optional user_id query parameter,
 you delete the quotas for this user in the specified tenant. If you
 omit this parameter, you delete the quotas for the specified project.

user_id.description:
The user ID. If you specify this query
 parameter, you update the quotas for this
 user in the specified tenant. If you omit
 this parameter, you update the quotas for
 the specified project.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

The ID for the tenant for which
 you want to show, update, or delete
 quotas. This ID is different from
 the first tenant ID that you
 specify in the URI: That ID is for
 the admin tenant.

actions.name: Show default quotas
actions.description: Shows default quotas for a specified tenant.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

class_name.description:
The name of the quota class for which you
 want to manage quotas.

actions.name: Show quotas for a quota class
actions.description: Shows the quotas for a specified quota class.

actions.name: Update quotas for a quota class
actions.description: Updates the quotas for a specified for a quota class.
